display_long_description:
# 🏡 Create your own Nook
Little Nook is a mixed-reality nook decor game where adorable frumis come to life in your own space. Invite frumis into your room, build a cozy nook for them, and watch them live and interact around you.
[media]

# 🥑 Invite Frumis -Nook Villagers-
Frumis are tiny, adorable creatures who live in your nook.
They wander around, react to their surroundings, and interact with interaction objects.
[media]

# 🍬 Fruit Gem MR Spawn 
Move around your room, spot bouncing Fruit Gems, and collect them for a more immersive Mixed Reality experience that truly connects the virtual and real worlds.
[media]

# 🪑 500+ Objects
Customize your nook with over 500 objects across 6 different themes.
Place furniture freely, and build walls and platforms to design your space exactly the way you want.
[media]

# 🎨 Show your style
Add your personal touch to every object.
Change colors, resize items, and adjust the scenery to create a nook that truly reflects your style.
[media]
